content: Could some one help on, how to disable the authentication on latest trifolia-on-fhir version. This is just for proof of Concept.
Running Trifolia -on -fhir locally, login screen is not popping to enter the credentials, could any one help to get into the login page.
In order to help you, I would have to have a better understanding of your environment.
For example, what authentication provider you are using
I would also suggest capturing the JavaScript Console in the browser
and pasting that here... it may shed some light on the problem
I've seen that kind of problem when the authentication provider's cross origins configuration was not setup to allow requests from that installation of ToF.
but, it's a shot in the dark without seeing an error message from either the browser's JavaScript console, or the server's console/logs
